chat_history.message: Hello, my iPhone 13 has the above issue: I accidentally entered the wrong postal code and city. I've changed it in the account now. Can they still change the delivery address? Thank you very much for your help,

Hello,

Please send the device to this Address:

Tuttlinger Straße 14
80686 München

+4915901392783

Regards,
Aysah, from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

We will update our logistics partner with the new address, thank you.

Regards,
YR
